description: Adds an explicit statement of limitations, caveats, or uncertainties related to the provided information. This decorator promotes intellectual honesty by acknowledging the boundaries of current knowledge, potential biases, or contextual constraints.

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: The level of detail in the limitations statement

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Where to place the limitations statement in the response

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: The primary aspect to focus on in the limitations

examples.description: Brief limitations statement at the end focused on methodology
examples.usage:
+++Limitations(detail=brief, focus=methodology)
Explain how personality tests predict career success.
examples.result: Explains personality tests and career success, concluding with a brief statement of methodological limitations

examples.description: Comprehensive limitations at the beginning covering all aspects
examples.usage:
+++Limitations(detail=comprehensive, position=beginning, focus=all)
Describe the current understanding of consciousness.
examples.result: Begins with a thorough discussion of the limitations in our understanding of consciousness before presenting the current state of knowledge
